feed.title: Computational Cognition
feed.subtitle: A website on the mathematical principles of artificial and biological cognition, written by a Mila (Quebec AI institute) PhD student.

entry.title: Welcome to Computational Cognition!
entry.content: Welcome to my new website! To learn about me, check out the “author” page; to learn about the website, check out “about”; to contact me or follow me on social media, check out the site footer. First blog post to come soon :)
